titleStmt.title: Two sermons on the third of the Lamentations of Ieremie preached at Hanwell in the first yeare of his Maiesties raigne, 1602. / The one by I.D. the other by R.C.
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625. aut
Winston, John, fl. 1614-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Ionas Man, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre, at the west dore of Paules Church in London,

notesStmt.note: I.D. = John Dod; R.C. = Robert Cleaver.
Imperfect: item at reel 2061:8 lacks final blank leaf.
Reproductions of originals in the British Library and Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Starre, at the west dore of Paules Church in London
